definition: silt/river sludge/to silt up/choked with silt/variant of 瘀[yu1]

sentences.english: The tradeoff is that you take nonlethal damage when you invoke it.
sentences.chinese: 代價是你使用的時候會不停受到淤傷。

sentences.english: He hit her, possibly more than once. She had multiple bruises.
sentences.chinese: 他打她，好像不止一次，她身上有多處的淤傷。

sentences.english: Biofeedback . Self-control allows you to take some damage as subdual damage.
sentences.chinese: 自控力使你能夠把一定傷害轉化成淤傷。
